Welcome to my research website for Kaggle's Donors Choose competition. For more information about the contest, see [here](https://www.kaggle.com/c/donorschoose-application-screening). 

To see the results of the sentiment analysis on the title and essays 1+2, click [here](Sentiment_analysis.html). There is also preliminary analysis regarding frequencies of particular words and approval status [here](Word_frequency.html).  

To see the prediction results, click [here](Sentiment_plus_xgboost.html) and [here](Preliminary_analysis_xgboost.html).
